snippet.title: Killing Floor 3 - Game Awards Trailer
snippet.description:
Killing Floor 3 is coming March 2025 w/ full crossplay between PC, PS5, and Xbox Series X|S! 
Join the Closed Beta Signup List: https://killingfloor3.com/

Wishlist Today! https://store.steampowered.com/app/1430190/Killing_Floor_3/

Somewhere in Texas, a zed outbreak has taken over a Horzine manufacturing facility. Intel also suggests that a more gruesome anomaly is lurking around... 

Check out this blood-soaked new trailer for Killing Floor 3 featuring a first look at Team Nightfall's Ninja, Medic, and Sharpshooter character classes and the fearsome Chimera boss! 

Killing Floor 3 is the next installment in the legendary action/horror series. This intense FPS puts you in the boots of a Nightfall specialist joining forces with up to five teammates to battle waves of Zeds, earn dosh, unlock skills, and build the ultimate arsenal.

Join the Killing Floor Community!
X: https://twitter.com/KillingFloor
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/killingfloorgame/?hl=en
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/KillingFloorGame
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@killingfloorgame
Discord: https://discord.gg/yGQrX3JR
